amendment.description: To increase the military death gratuity to $100,000, effective with respect to any deaths of members of the Armed Forces on active duty after October 7, 2001.

action.text: Amendment SA 334 proposed by Senator Kerry.
Motion to table amendment SA 334 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 75. Record Vote Number: 92.

vote.text: Amendment SA 334 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
